subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk had his second consecutive three-goal game and Pascal Dupuis scored the go-ahead goal with 2 minutes 8 seconds to play last night in the Atlanta Thrashers’ 6-4 victory over the host Tampa Bay Lightning.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk had his second consecutive three-goal game and Pascal Dupuis scored the go-ahead goal with 2 minutes 8 seconds to play last night in the Atlanta Thrashers’ 6-4 victory over the host Tampa Bay Lightning.
